page.title: 07Tourist Attractions
page.content:
Touristic interest in Wybunbury has recently been awakened due to the project to rescue the original Church tower, all that is left of the original Church, and which is gradually subsiding and thus leans at an angle.
This interest is partly due to a feature on local television and quite an extensive publicity campaign by the group which wants to preserve the tower.Tourism is still of very minor importance, though and certainly no special provision has been made for tourists, nor are there any special amenities.In fact the village is scarcely aware of its tourist status, so small is the tourist trade.
